item.description:
Hello All,
We decided to have it on both days but don't feel you have to make both of them unless you want to.
We will bring a box of joe, munchkins and all the shibas we can to make a great day.
I won't be there on the 15th but will certainly make it on the 29th of Nov., same time same place.
IN Dec. plan o having a 'party' with presents for the furlids, nothing fancy, $10.00 limit, no more. We don't want to put a strain on anyone's pocketbook/wallet. If you feel you don't want to bring something, that's fine just sit back and watch the fun.
Looking forward to the meet-up and Thanks for being so supportive.
I will make a list as to who is bringing what and maybe the next time. someone else can donate.
To those of you who have never been to Bark Place, once you park your car, it is about 1/4 to 1/2 mile to Bark Place so don't bring anything too heavy.
Cheri

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: November Get Together
